body.p: 1. Ancestor of a group of people who returned to Judah with Zerubbabel after the exile (Ezr 2:16; Neh 7:21).
2. Ancestor of a family of gatekeepers who also returned to Judah with Zerubbabel (Ezr 2:42; Neh 7:45).
3. Political leader who signed Ezraâ€™s covenant of faithfulness to God with Nehemiah and others after the exile (Neh 10:17).
